state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First step, try to move north. Once you finish that, make an effort to venture east. And then, make an effort to head east. And then, try to head north. Okay, and then, attempt to go west. Once you finish that, make an effort to move west. And then, go to the south. And then, make an attempt to move west. Then, take a trip south. And then, make an attempt to go south. And then, go east. That done, travel south. And then, make an effort to go east. Next, travel north. And then, lift the coin from the floor of the study. And once you've done that, you win! -= Workshop =- I am honoured to announce that you are now in the workshop. You can barely contain your excitement. There is an unblocked exit to the north. > -= Workshop =-0/1
